Pella stands for a western European federation# but those working

Pella is officially for the "Gassa per II Me2sioslomow program —

His critics believe Pella has avoided decisive action on major
Italian political questions because he is a compromiser and political
manipulator motivated mostly by the desire to remain In office*
But an outsider is apt to be more impressed by the present
delicate balance in the Italian parliament* a political fact of life
which Pella cannot afford to forget for a moment.
